name: Light Age
description:
In the darkness, there will always be a light for you... but never take everything for granted.

Game made for the #BWJam, and it has only two colors: #FFFFFF (white) and #000000 (black).

Commands

WASD/arrows - move the player

How to play

The game is composed of 13 levels. At each level, the goal is to collect all the items and to reach the tile. Don't get hit by enemies and avoid traps. Good luck.
